title: Taking 3-5 min to load after winning/leaving a game
body: Its taking forevr  just to have the end game screen to load, closing the client seems to be faster.

replies.body: Hmmmm you probably have "close client during game" turned on in the client settings. Click on the gear icon in the upper left of the League client, and make sure that option is *not* checked, and let me know if that helps get those stat screens loading quicker.
yeah, but i can hear the champ select music int he background and it's really annoying
